column.name: PERSON_ID
column.valueComputed: SELECT ID FROM LIBRARY.PERSON WHERE FIRST_NAME = 'OSOBA1'

column.name: BOOK_ID
column.valueComputed: SELECT ID FROM LIBRARY.BOOK WHERE TITLE = 'KNJIGA1'

column.name: LIBRARIAN_ID
column.valueComputed: SELECT ID FROM LIBRARY.LIBRARIAN WHERE FIRST_NAME = 'KNJIŽNIČAR1'
